fields.name: Football
fields.description: A team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.

fields.name: Basketball
fields.description: A team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, oppose each other on a rectangular court.

fields.name: Manchester City
fields.description: A top English football club based in Manchester.

fields.name: Arsenal
fields.description: A top English football club based in London.

fields.name: LA Lakers
